vsParam:
Okay, done!
You are in a good status today, too, [px]!

Wow... [px], your alchemical skills
are amazing!

Uh? Is alchemy in your world different from
the one we have here?

Hmm... They are generally the same, but there are
subtle distinctions in terms of specific operations.

Hmm! I am so curious!
I want to see it. Do you, [px]?
Uh! There, there's nothing much to see...

You, you are not forcing me...
I am just, a little embarrassed...

But this is a rare chance,
I'll show you...

Hold, hold on! Let me see, the recipe that can be
done now... Okay, I'll do this one!
What is it? What is it?

Ah... Uh, I have a favor to ask of you...
Can you help me get some fish for my materials?

Yes, fish. I'll finish the preparations for
the synthesis before you come back!

Alchemy using fish... What would it produce?
[px], let's go catch some fish!

Wow, the fish is so fresh! Thank you!
Let's start... Stir, and stir...

"Stir, and stir"...
Alchemy in your world is really unconstrained, huh...

This is the "canned fish", here we have the "fish spike
bomb", which is a bomb. And then this one is...

Oh...
You can make so many things with fish!

So, the alchemy in your world
in centered on fish?

Ah, no. I grew up in a fishing village of Alanya.
And the main product of it was fish...

Since fish is readily available in my hometown, my
master developed recipes like the one just now for me.

Oh, you also have a master!
What's your master like?

Ah, what's my master like...
Let me think...

Very gentle, and kind of logy...
Ah, [px], you resemble her...

Uh? You are saying
[px] is kind of logy, huh?

Ah! T, that's not what I meant...
Sorry!

Ha-ha! But we can tell that you like
your master very much! I want to meet her.

Um, Although Rorona Sensei is an adult woman,
she's very kawaii!

Uh? Rorona?
Your master is Rorona!?

Eh——!?
Did Rorona Sensei come here, too!?

Ah, er. Wait... an adult?
I think she is, hmm...

Uh? N, no matter how young Rorona Sensei may seem,
she doesn't look like a child...

So your master and the Rorona we know are not the
same person? Never mind, just forget it!

But then again, you are really an outstanding alchemist
for making all these things out of fish neat and quick!
Should I take her as my master...

Uh——! That's not true!
[px]'s alchemy is amazing too!

Y, you are flattering me, how can I be your master!
I have many things to consult you!

But... After hearing that,
I am a little confident in my alchemical skills..

I can't do anything well, except for alchemy.
I really love it, so put in all the efforts to practice...

[px], you must work hard too,
don't lose out to Totori!
